title: Sri Lanka needs $3 billion in six months to stave off crisis: Finance minister - Economic Times
content: Sri Lanka needs $3 billion in six months to stave off crisis: Finance minister  Economic Times
description: The island nation of 22 million people has been hit by prolonged power cuts, with drugs, fuel and other items running short, bringing angry protesters out on the streets and putting President Gotabaya Rajapaksa under mounting pressure.
